attributes.action: Go ahead with the building of the childrens hospital at St James hospital, Leeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After being promised a new childrens hospital to be built in Leeds, the goverment has decided to scrap it for now. We now have thousands more managers and more red tape in the NHS. They spend billions on the war in Iraq and are pouring billions into the London olympics yet they cannot find the £202 million to build a much needed childrens hospital. Children will have to suffer and travel for miles for treatement. They need to get their priorities right
